select * from ( select i.bank_info_name as bankName,i.bank_info_acc_type as accountType,i.bank_info_intr_rate as interestRate,i.bank_info_serv_charge as serviceCharge from pm_user u,pm_bank b,pm_acc_type a,pm_user_account s,pm_bank_acc_info i where s.bank_id=b.bank_id and s.user_id=u.user_id and s.acc_type_id=a.acc_type_id and u.first_name=#{firstName} and u.last_name=#{lastName} and u.user_age=#{age} and i.bank_info_name=b.bank_name and i.bank_info_acc_type=a.acc_type )
